## p. 19 (#31) ##############################################

Social Register
Summer
1917.
71.!
JUNE, 1917.
VOL. XXXI, No. 71.
Contains the Summer Addresses of residents of
New York Pittsburgh Seattle
Washington
Cleveland
Portland
Philadelphia Cincinnati Southern California
Chicago
Dayton
(Los Angeles & Pasadena)
Boston
St. Paul
Baltimore
Providence Minneapolis Buffalo
St. Louis San Francisco New Orleans
Southern Cities
Each city distinct by itself, arranged in the above order.
1
န
SOCIAL . REGISTER . ASSOCIATION,
BOWLING GREEN, 29 BROADWAY, NEW YORK CITY.
Copyright 1917 by THE SOCIAL REGISTER ASSOCIATION.


## p. 19 (#32) ##############################################

Names of Juniors 12 to 27appear under
The winter Social Register of each city appears in November,
with Dönerm. in December, January, February and April.
They record the full names and addresses of members
of prominent families, grouped together, the clubs to which
they belong, and the marriage, death, and European arrival
and departure of each person as it may occur.
the names of
N*** 14 to 20 Solder members of their families.
The Locater cataloguing in one al phabetical order every name
in all the Social Registers with the family's head under which it
may be found and the city in which the name appears, is !
essential, owing to the many inter-marriages among families
in the various cities and constant changes from one city
to another. Reference to the Locater shows at once under
what city to look for any desired name and there all required
information may be gleaned.
The names of Maidend who have married into families of other
cities appear among the. Martens of their former city with
their present married name and the city of their residence in
italics.
Information for November should be received before October 15.
The subscription is $5.00 per annum for each city or $7.50
with the Locater.
A subscription of $35.00 will include all the issues for
every city for the year and the Locater.
To insure the finding of a name in the Social Register look
for it first in the Locater.


## p. 19 (#33) ##############################################

Families not appearing in this Summer issue will be found at
the address given in previous issues.
Dumelles under front cover of this book should be con-
sulted first for all changes. If the name be not found there,
it is correct in the main book.
Ey.
1
Sloop Yacht.
A Schooner Yacht.
Steam Yacht or Launch.

Corinthian Yacht Club of Philadelphia.
Eastern Yacht Club of Boston,
Lc. Larchmont Yacht Club.
Ny. New York Yacht Club.

Seawanhaka Corinthian Yacht Club of New York.
ab’d. Abroad.
av'd. Arrived.
po. Post Office.
